scripts.build: npm run build:spec && npm run build:slides
scripts.build:slides: for i in $(cd slides; ls -1 *.md); do slidev build --out ../build/slides/${i%.md} --base /proposal-native-promise-predicate/slides/${i%.md}/ slides/$i; done
scripts.build-loose: node -e 'fs.mkdirSync("build", { recursive: true })' && ecmarkup --load-biblio @tc39/ecma262-biblio --verbose spec.emu build/index.html --lint-spec
